channel.title: Herbalist Defile Error
channel.description:
#### What happened? I wanted to defile the dying target. System message appears "There was an error setting your ability. Please notify a developer." Dead Target was not defiled.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Target had to be defiled.

item.title: Herbalist Defile Error
item.dc:creator: Peachly
item.description:
What happened?

I wanted to defile the dying target. System message appears “There was an error setting your ability. Please notify a developer.”
Dead Target was not defiled.

What was SUPPOSED to happen? Target had to be defiled.
